name: Enma
description: The legendary katana wielded by Kozuki Oden. It drains its user's Haki to unleash unmatched slashes.

name: Muramasa
description: A cursed blade said to thirst for blood. It grants immense power at the cost of control.

name: Dragon Claws
description: Forged from ancient dragon scales, these gauntlets channel pure destruction through each strike.

name: Shadow Bow
description: A bow that shoots arrows made of darkness itself. Favored by assassins from the Grand Line.

name: Thunder Spear
description: Infused with the power of lightning, each thrust crackles with energy that can pierce even steel.

name: Marine Cutlass
description: A standard issue weapon of the Marines. Reliable, balanced, and easy to wield.

name: Kraken Whip
description: Made from the tendons of a Kraken. Its reach and speed make it deadly in skilled hands.

name: Obsidian Dagger
description: A black blade that cuts silently through the air. Favored by bounty hunters in the New World.

name: Icebreaker Hammer
description: A mighty hammer capable of shattering frozen seas. Heavy but brutally effective.

name: Flame Scythe
description: A cursed weapon engulfed in eternal flame. Its swings burn the battlefield in fiery arcs.
